content: 1 Paul､ an apostle of Christ Jesus through the will of God, And Timothy my brother,—
content_old: 1 Paul､ an apostle of Christ Jesus through the will of God, And Timothy my brother,—

content: 2 Unto the holy and faithful brethren in Christ that are in Colosse, Favour unto you､ and peace､ from our God and Father.
content_old: 2 Unto the holy and faithful brethren in Christ that are in Colosse, Favour unto you､ and peace､ from our God and Father.

content: 3 We are giving thanks unto God､ the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, Always､ for you offering prayer,—
content_old: 3 We are giving thanks unto God､ the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, Always､ for you offering prayer,—

content: 4 Having heard of your faith in Christ Jesus And of the love which ye have unto all the saints,—
content_old: 4 Having heard of your faith in Christ Jesus And of the love which ye have unto all the saints,—

content: 5 Because of the hope that is lying by for you in the heavens､ Of which ye heard before､ in the word of the truth of the glad-message､
content_old: 5 Because of the hope that is lying by for you in the heavens､ Of which ye heard before､ in the word of the truth of the glad-message､

content: 6 when it presented itself unto you; Even as in all the world also it is bearing fruit and growing､ even as also among you, From the day when ye heard､ and came personally to know the favour of God in truth,
content_old: 6 when it presented itself unto you; Even as in all the world also it is bearing fruit and growing､ even as also among you, From the day when ye heard､ and came personally to know the favour of God in truth,

content: 7 Even as ye learned it from Epaphras, our beloved fellow-servant, Who is faithful in our behalf､ as a minister of the Christ,
content_old: 7 Even as ye learned it from Epaphras, our beloved fellow-servant, Who is faithful in our behalf､ as a minister of the Christ,

content: 8 Who also hath made evident unto us your love in spirit.
content_old: 8 Who also hath made evident unto us your love in spirit.

content: 9 For this cause we also From the day when we heard of you Cease not in your behalf praying and asking— That ye may be filled unto the personal knowledge of his will､ In all spiritual wisdom and discernment,
content_old: 9 For this cause we also From the day when we heard of you Cease not in your behalf praying and asking— That ye may be filled unto the personal knowledge of his will､ In all spiritual wisdom and discernment,

content: 10 So as to walk worthily of the Lord､ unto all pleasing､ In every good work bearing fruit､ And growing in the personal knowledge of God,
content_old: 10 So as to walk worthily of the Lord､ unto all pleasing､ In every good work bearing fruit､ And growing in the personal knowledge of God,

content: 11 With all power being empowered､ According to the grasp of his glory､ Unto all endurance and long-suffering with joy,
content_old: 11 With all power being empowered､ According to the grasp of his glory､ Unto all endurance and long-suffering with joy,

content: 12 Giving thanks unto the Father that hath made you sufficient for your share in the inheritance of the saints in the light,
content_old: 12 Giving thanks unto the Father that hath made you sufficient for your share in the inheritance of the saints in the light,

content: 13 Who hath rescued us out of the authority of the darkness､ And translated us into the kingdom of the Son of his love;
content_old: 13 Who hath rescued us out of the authority of the darkness､ And translated us into the kingdom of the Son of his love;

content: 14 In whom we have our redemption—the remission of our sins,—
content_old: 14 In whom we have our redemption—the remission of our sins,—

content: 15 Who is an image of the unseen God､ Firstborn of all creation,—
content_old: 15 Who is an image of the unseen God､ Firstborn of all creation,—

content: 16 Because in him were created all things in the heavens and upon the earth､ The things seen and the things unseen, Whether thrones or lordships or principalities or authorities,—They all through him and for him have been created,
content_old: 16 Because in him were created all things in the heavens and upon the earth､ The things seen and the things unseen, Whether thrones or lordships or principalities or authorities,—They all through him and for him have been created,

content: 17 And he is before all､ And they all in him hold together;
content_old: 17 And he is before all､ And they all in him hold together;

content: 18 And he is the head of the body､ the assembly, Who is the beginning､ Firstborn from among the dead､ In order that he might become in all things himself pre-eminent;—
content_old: 18 And he is the head of the body､ the assembly, Who is the beginning､ Firstborn from among the dead､ In order that he might become in all things himself pre-eminent;—

content: 19 Because in him was all the fulness well pleased to dwell,
content_old: 19 Because in him was all the fulness well pleased to dwell,

content: 20 And through him fully to reconcile all things unto him､ Making peace through the blood of his cross,— Through him—Whether the things upon the earth or the things in the heavens;
content_old: 20 And through him fully to reconcile all things unto him､ Making peace through the blood of his cross,— Through him—Whether the things upon the earth or the things in the heavens;

content: 21 And you Who at one time were estranged and enemies in your mind in your wicked works Yet now hath he fully reconciled､
content_old: 21 And you Who at one time were estranged and enemies in your mind in your wicked works Yet now hath he fully reconciled､

content: 22 in his body of flesh､ through means of his death, To present you holy and blameless and unaccusable before him,—
content_old: 22 in his body of flesh､ through means of his death, To present you holy and blameless and unaccusable before him,—

content: 23 If､ at least､ ye are abiding still in the faith､ founded and firm､ and not to be moved away from the hope of the glad-message which ye have heard､ Which hath been proclaimed in all creation which is under heaven,—Of which I Paul have become minister.
content_old: 23 If､ at least､ ye are abiding still in the faith､ founded and firm､ and not to be moved away from the hope of the glad-message which ye have heard､ Which hath been proclaimed in all creation which is under heaven,—Of which I Paul have become minister.

content: 24 Now am I rejoicing in the sufferings on your behalf, And am filling up the things that lack of the tribulations of the Christ､ in my flesh､ In behalf of his body､ Which is the assembly,
content_old: 24 Now am I rejoicing in the sufferings on your behalf, And am filling up the things that lack of the tribulations of the Christ､ in my flesh､ In behalf of his body､ Which is the assembly,

content: 25 Of which I have become minister— According to the administration of God which hath been given unto me to you-ward､ To fill up the word of God,
content_old: 25 Of which I have become minister— According to the administration of God which hath been given unto me to you-ward､ To fill up the word of God,

content: 26 The sacred secret which had been hidden away from the ages and from the generations､ But now hath been made manifest unto his saints—
content_old: 26 The sacred secret which had been hidden away from the ages and from the generations､ But now hath been made manifest unto his saints—

content: 27 Unto whom God hath been pleased to make known what is the glorious wealth of this sacred secret among the nations, Which is Christ in you､ the hope of the glory,—
content_old: 27 Unto whom God hath been pleased to make known what is the glorious wealth of this sacred secret among the nations, Which is Christ in you､ the hope of the glory,—

content: 28 Whom we are declaring, Admonishing every man､ And teaching every man､ in all wisdom, In order that we may present every man complete in Christ;
content_old: 28 Whom we are declaring, Admonishing every man､ And teaching every man､ in all wisdom, In order that we may present every man complete in Christ;

content: 1 For I desire you to know､ how great a contest I am having—in behalf of you､ And of those in Laodicea, And as many as have not seen my face in the flesh;
content_old: 1 For I desire you to know､ how great a contest I am having—in behalf of you､ And of those in Laodicea, And as many as have not seen my face in the flesh;

content: 2 In order that their hearts may be encouraged, Being knit together in love､ Even unto all the riches of the full assurance of their understanding, Unto a personal knowledge of the sacred secret of God,—Christ:
content_old: 2 In order that their hearts may be encouraged, Being knit together in love､ Even unto all the riches of the full assurance of their understanding, Unto a personal knowledge of the sacred secret of God,—Christ:

content: 3 In whom are all the treasures of wisdom and knowledge hidden away.
content_old: 3 In whom are all the treasures of wisdom and knowledge hidden away.

content: 4 This I say､ in order that no one may be reasoning you aside with plausible discourse;
content_old: 4 This I say､ in order that no one may be reasoning you aside with plausible discourse;

content: 5 For though､ indeed､ in the flesh I am absent Yet in the spirit with you I am— Rejoicing､ and beholding your order and the solid firmness of your Christ-ward faith.
content_old: 5 For though､ indeed､ in the flesh I am absent Yet in the spirit with you I am— Rejoicing､ and beholding your order and the solid firmness of your Christ-ward faith.

content: 6 As､ therefore､ ye have accepted the Anointed Jesus as your Lord In him be walking,—
content_old: 6 As､ therefore､ ye have accepted the Anointed Jesus as your Lord In him be walking,—

content: 7 Rooted､ and being built up､ in him, And making yourselves sure in your faith, Even as ye have been taught,— Surpassing therein with thanksgiving.
content_old: 7 Rooted､ and being built up､ in him, And making yourselves sure in your faith, Even as ye have been taught,— Surpassing therein with thanksgiving.

content: 8 Be taking heed､ lest there shall be anyone leading you off as a spoil, Through means of their philosophy､ and an empty deceit,— According to the instruction of men, According to the first principles of the world,— And not according to Christ:
content_old: 8 Be taking heed､ lest there shall be anyone leading you off as a spoil, Through means of their philosophy､ and an empty deceit,— According to the instruction of men, According to the first principles of the world,— And not according to Christ:

content: 9 Because in him dwelleth all the fulness of the Godhead bodily,
content_old: 9 Because in him dwelleth all the fulness of the Godhead bodily,

content: 10 And ye are in him filled full,— Who is the head of all principality and authority,
content_old: 10 And ye are in him filled full,— Who is the head of all principality and authority,

content: 11 In whom ye have also been circumcised with a circumcision not done by hand､ In the despoiling of the body of flesh､ In the circumcision of the Christ,—
content_old: 11 In whom ye have also been circumcised with a circumcision not done by hand､ In the despoiling of the body of flesh､ In the circumcision of the Christ,—

content: 12 Having been buried together with him in your immersion, Wherein also ye have been raised together､ Through your faith in the energising of God—Who raised him from among the dead.
content_old: 12 Having been buried together with him in your immersion, Wherein also ye have been raised together､ Through your faith in the energising of God—Who raised him from among the dead.

content: 13 And as for you— Who were dead by your offences and by the uncircumcision of your flesh He hath brought you to life together with him,— Having in favour forgiven us all our offences,
content_old: 13 And as for you— Who were dead by your offences and by the uncircumcision of your flesh He hath brought you to life together with him,— Having in favour forgiven us all our offences,

content: 14 Having blotted out the handwriting against us by the decrees,— Which was hostile to us,— And hath taken away the same out of the midst､ Nailing it up to the cross:
content_old: 14 Having blotted out the handwriting against us by the decrees,— Which was hostile to us,— And hath taken away the same out of the midst､ Nailing it up to the cross:

content: 15 Spoiling the principalities and the authorities He made of them an open example, Celebrating a triumph over them thereby.
content_old: 15 Spoiling the principalities and the authorities He made of them an open example, Celebrating a triumph over them thereby.

content: 16 Let no one､ therefore､ be judging you— In eating and in drinking, Or in respect of feast､ or new moon､ or sabbath,—
content_old: 16 Let no one､ therefore､ be judging you— In eating and in drinking, Or in respect of feast､ or new moon､ or sabbath,—

content: 17 Which are a shadow of the things to come. Whereas the body is of the Christ.
content_old: 17 Which are a shadow of the things to come. Whereas the body is of the Christ.

content: 18 Let no one against you be arbitrating､ however wishful,— In respect of lowliness of mind, and of a religious observance of the messengers: Upon what things he hath seen taking his stand, In vain puffed up by his carnal mind,—
content_old: 18 Let no one against you be arbitrating､ however wishful,— In respect of lowliness of mind, and of a religious observance of the messengers: Upon what things he hath seen taking his stand, In vain puffed up by his carnal mind,—

content: 19 And not holding fast the head: From which all the body Through means of its joints and uniting bands receiving supply､ and connecting itself together Groweth with the growth of God.
content_old: 19 And not holding fast the head: From which all the body Through means of its joints and uniting bands receiving supply､ and connecting itself together Groweth with the growth of God.

content: 20 If ye have died､ together with Christ､ from the first principles of the world Why as though alive in the world are ye submitting to decrees,—
content_old: 20 If ye have died､ together with Christ､ from the first principles of the world Why as though alive in the world are ye submitting to decrees,—

content: 21 Do not handle､ Nor taste､ Nor touch;—
content_old: 21 Do not handle､ Nor taste､ Nor touch;—

content: 22 Which things are all for decay in the using up;— According to the commandments and teachings of men?
content_old: 22 Which things are all for decay in the using up;— According to the commandments and teachings of men?

content: 1 If､ therefore､ ye have been raised together with the Christ The things on high be seeking､ Where the Christ is—on the right hand of God sitting;
content_old: 1 If､ therefore､ ye have been raised together with the Christ The things on high be seeking､ Where the Christ is—on the right hand of God sitting;

content: 2 The things on high hold in esteem､ Not the things upon the earth:
content_old: 2 The things on high hold in esteem､ Not the things upon the earth:

content: 3 For ye have died, And your life is hid､ together with the Christ､ in God,—
content_old: 3 For ye have died, And your life is hid､ together with the Christ､ in God,—

content: 4 As soon as the Christ shall be made manifest—Our life Then ye aIso together with him shall be made manifest in glory;
content_old: 4 As soon as the Christ shall be made manifest—Our life Then ye aIso together with him shall be made manifest in glory;

content: 5 Make dead､ therefore､ your members that are on the earth— As regardeth fornication､ impurity､ passion､ base coveting､ and greed, the which is idolatry,—
content_old: 5 Make dead､ therefore､ your members that are on the earth— As regardeth fornication､ impurity､ passion､ base coveting､ and greed, the which is idolatry,—

content: 6 On account of which things cometh the anger of God,—
content_old: 6 On account of which things cometh the anger of God,—

content: 7 Wherein ye also walked､ at one time､ when ye were living in these things;
content_old: 7 Wherein ye also walked､ at one time､ when ye were living in these things;

content: 8 But now do ye also put them all away,—Anger､ wrath､ baseness､ defamation､ shameful talk out of your mouth:
content_old: 8 But now do ye also put them all away,—Anger､ wrath､ baseness､ defamation､ shameful talk out of your mouth:

content: 9 Be not guilty of falsehood one to another: Having stript off the old man､ together with his practices,
content_old: 9 Be not guilty of falsehood one to another: Having stript off the old man､ together with his practices,

content: 10 And having put on the new— Who is being moulded afresh unto personal knowledge, After the image of him that hath created him,—
content_old: 10 And having put on the new— Who is being moulded afresh unto personal knowledge, After the image of him that hath created him,—

content: 11 Wherein there cannot be Greek and Jew､ circumcision and uncircumcision､ foreigner､ Scythian､ bond､ free,—But all things and in all Christ:
content_old: 11 Wherein there cannot be Greek and Jew､ circumcision and uncircumcision､ foreigner､ Scythian､ bond､ free,—But all things and in all Christ:

content: 12 Put on､ therefore､ as men chosen of God､ holy and beloved Tender affections of compassion､ graciousness､ lowliness of mind､ meekness､ long-suffering,
content_old: 12 Put on､ therefore､ as men chosen of God､ holy and beloved Tender affections of compassion､ graciousness､ lowliness of mind､ meekness､ long-suffering,

content: 13 Bearing one with another､ and in favour forgiving one another—if any against any have a complaint,— According as the Lord in favour forgave you so also ye;
content_old: 13 Bearing one with another､ and in favour forgiving one another—if any against any have a complaint,— According as the Lord in favour forgave you so also ye;

content: 14 And over all these things love, Which is a uniting-bond of completeness;
content_old: 14 And over all these things love, Which is a uniting-bond of completeness;

content: 15 And let the peace of Christ act as umpire in your hearts,— Unto which ye have been called in one body And be thankful:
content_old: 15 And let the peace of Christ act as umpire in your hearts,— Unto which ye have been called in one body And be thankful:

content: 16 Let the word of the Christ dwell within you richly,— In all wisdom teaching and admonishing one another, with psalms�� hymns､ spiritual songs, With gratitude raising song with your hearts unto God:
content_old: 16 Let the word of the Christ dwell within you richly,— In all wisdom teaching and admonishing one another, with psalms�� hymns､ spiritual songs, With gratitude raising song with your hearts unto God:

content: 17 And whatsoever ye may be doing､ in word､ or in work All things do in the name of the Lord Jesus, Giving thanks unto the Divine Father through him:—
content_old: 17 And whatsoever ye may be doing､ in word､ or in work All things do in the name of the Lord Jesus, Giving thanks unto the Divine Father through him:—

content: 18 Ye wives! be submitting yourselves unto your husbands､ as is becoming in the Lord;
content_old: 18 Ye wives! be submitting yourselves unto your husbands､ as is becoming in the Lord;

content: 19 Ye husbands! be loving your wives､ and be not embittered against them;
content_old: 19 Ye husbands! be loving your wives､ and be not embittered against them;

content: 20 Ye children! be obedient unto your parents in all things, for this is well pleasing in the Lord;
content_old: 20 Ye children! be obedient unto your parents in all things, for this is well pleasing in the Lord;

content: 21 Ye fathers! be not irritating your children, lest they be disheartened;
content_old: 21 Ye fathers! be not irritating your children, lest they be disheartened;

content: 22 Ye servants! be obedient in all things unto them who according to the flesh are your masters,— Not with eye-service､ as man-pleasers, But with singleness of heart､ revering the Lord,—
content_old: 22 Ye servants! be obedient in all things unto them who according to the flesh are your masters,— Not with eye-service､ as man-pleasers, But with singleness of heart､ revering the Lord,—

content: 23 Whatsoever ye may be doing From the soul be working at it, As unto the Lord､ and not unto men,—
content_old: 23 Whatsoever ye may be doing From the soul be working at it, As unto the Lord､ and not unto men,—

content: 24 Knowing that from the Lord ye shall duly receive the recompense of the inheritance,—Unto the Lord Christ are ye in service;
content_old: 24 Knowing that from the Lord ye shall duly receive the recompense of the inheritance,—Unto the Lord Christ are ye in service;

content: 1 Ye masters! that which is just and equitable unto your servants be rendering, Knowing that ye also have a Master in heaven.
content_old: 1 Ye masters! that which is just and equitable unto your servants be rendering, Knowing that ye also have a Master in heaven.

content: 2 Unto prayer be devoting yourselves, Watching therein with thanksgiving:
content_old: 2 Unto prayer be devoting yourselves, Watching therein with thanksgiving:

content: 3 Praying､ at the same time､ for us also,— That God would open unto us a door for the word, So that we may speak the sacred secret of the Christ—For the sake of which also I am in bonds,
content_old: 3 Praying､ at the same time､ for us also,— That God would open unto us a door for the word, So that we may speak the sacred secret of the Christ—For the sake of which also I am in bonds,

content: 4 That I may make it manifest as behoveth me to speak.
content_old: 4 That I may make it manifest as behoveth me to speak.

content: 5 In wisdom be walking towards them who are without,— The opportunity buying out for yourselves,
content_old: 5 In wisdom be walking towards them who are without,— The opportunity buying out for yourselves,

content: 6 Your discourse being always with benefit､ With salt seasoned,— That ye may know how it behoveth you unto each one to be making answer.
content_old: 6 Your discourse being always with benefit､ With salt seasoned,— That ye may know how it behoveth you unto each one to be making answer.

content: 7 All the things which relate unto myself Shall Tychicus make known unto you— The beloved brother and faithful minister and fellow-servant in the Lord,
content_old: 7 All the things which relate unto myself Shall Tychicus make known unto you— The beloved brother and faithful minister and fellow-servant in the Lord,

content: 8 Whom I have sent unto you､ to this very end､— That ye may get to know the things which concern us､ And he may encourage your hearts:
content_old: 8 Whom I have sent unto you､ to this very end､— That ye may get to know the things which concern us､ And he may encourage your hearts:

content: 9 Together with Onesimus､ the faithful and beloved brother, Who is from among you:— All things unto you will they make known､ that are taking place here.
content_old: 9 Together with Onesimus､ the faithful and beloved brother, Who is from among you:— All things unto you will they make known､ that are taking place here.

content: 10 Aristarchus､ my fellow-captive､ saluteth you; And Mark､ the first cousin of Barnabas,— Concerning whom ye have received commands—if he come unto you give him welcome;
content_old: 10 Aristarchus､ my fellow-captive､ saluteth you; And Mark､ the first cousin of Barnabas,— Concerning whom ye have received commands—if he come unto you give him welcome;

content: 11 And Jesus､ he that is called Justus,— They being of the circumcision; These only are my fellow-workers unto the kingdom of God, Men who have been､ unto me､ a comfort.
content_old: 11 And Jesus､ he that is called Justus,— They being of the circumcision; These only are my fellow-workers unto the kingdom of God, Men who have been､ unto me､ a comfort.

content: 12 Epaphras who is from among you､ a servant of Christ Jesus､ saluteth you,— At all times contending in your behalf in his prayers, That ye may be caused to stand complete and fully assured in everything willed by God;
content_old: 12 Epaphras who is from among you､ a servant of Christ Jesus､ saluteth you,— At all times contending in your behalf in his prayers, That ye may be caused to stand complete and fully assured in everything willed by God;

content: 13 For I bear him witness､ that he hath great toil in behalf of you､ and them in Laodicea､ and them in Hierapolis.
content_old: 13 For I bear him witness､ that he hath great toil in behalf of you､ and them in Laodicea､ and them in Hierapolis.

content: 14 Luke､ the beloved physician, and Demas, salute you.
content_old: 14 Luke､ the beloved physician, and Demas, salute you.

content: 15 Salute ye the brethren in Laodicea, Also Nymphas､ and the assembly which meeteth at her house.
content_old: 15 Salute ye the brethren in Laodicea, Also Nymphas､ and the assembly which meeteth at her house.

content: 16 And as soon as the epistle hath been read amongst you cause that in the assembly of Laodiceans also it be read; And that from Laodicea that ye also read.
content_old: 16 And as soon as the epistle hath been read amongst you cause that in the assembly of Laodiceans also it be read; And that from Laodicea that ye also read.

content: 17 And say to Archippus: Be taking heed unto the ministry which thou hast accepted in the Lord,— That the same thou fulfil.
content_old: 17 And say to Archippus: Be taking heed unto the ministry which thou hast accepted in the Lord,— That the same thou fulfil.
